PCI_Dev_BAR Struct Reference

unsigned long pci_flags

Detailed Description

This is the private data for each board's BAR that is mapped in. NOTE: each structure MUST have minor as the first entry because it it tested by a void * to see what BAR it is - See mmap()

Definition at line 209 of file lscdma.h.

Member Data Documentation

void* PCI_Dev_BAR::kvm_addr
 

the virtual address of a BAR mapped into kernel space, used in ioremap

void* PCI_Dev_BAR::pci_addr
 

the physical bus address of the BAR (assigned by PCI system), used in mmap
